title: Remove plaintext credentials from zsh startup files
description: ~/.zshrc and ~/.zshenv contain multiple plaintext API tokens/passwords. Migrate to secure secret storage (1Password/keychain/.env loaded per-project), rotate exposed credentials, and scrub shell history/git exposure risk.

title: 4.1: Extend DB-004 security test to cover scripture_toggle_ready
description: Story 4.1 task 9.4 says non-members must be unable to set partner ready state or role. Current pgTAP DB-004 only verifies scripture_select_role. Add throws_ok coverage for scripture_toggle_ready on non-member access.

title: 4.1: Include user_id in partner_joined broadcast payload
description: Task 4.4 contract requires partner_joined payload { user_id }. Current hook sends empty payload {}. Align event payload with contract and verify via unit test assertions.

title: 4.1: Strengthen E2E readiness assertion semantics
description: E2E-001 currently checks partner-ready indicator visibility only. This can pass when text remains 'not ready yet'. Assert explicit ready-state text and add reciprocal checks to catch partner sync regressions.

title: 4.1: Handle session_converted broadcast without re-calling RPC
description: useScriptureBroadcast currently handles session_converted by calling convertToSolo(), which invokes scripture_convert_to_solo RPC again. After user2_id is nulled, partner clients can lose access and fail to transition. Implement local state transition path for broadcast-driven conversion and add coverage.

title: Investigate shell resolution failure in local zsh
description: Diagnose why shell commands or hostnames are not resolving in the current environment, identify root cause (PATH/aliases/functions, zsh config, or DNS/network), and document actionable fix.
close_reason: Root cause found and fixed: stale pyenv lock/prototype file ~/.pyenv/shims/.pyenv-shim blocked pyenv rehash during zsh init; removed file and validated pyenv rehash + zsh command/DNS resolution.

title: 4.1: Align lobby ready button copy with story contract
description: Story task text specifies Ready/Not Ready copy; implementation uses I'm Ready/Ready âœ“. Either align implementation copy or update story contract and tests to remove ambiguity.

title: 4.1: Fix partnerReady mapping for user2 broadcasts
description: In scriptureReadingSlice.onBroadcastReceived, partnerReady is always set from payload.user2Ready. For user2 clients this mirrors self-ready, not partner-ready, causing incorrect lobby state and AC4 mismatch. Update mapping using caller identity and add tests for both user1/user2 perspectives.
